Spain: Battle of Golpejera: Sancho the Strong defeated and captured Alfonso the Brave near Carrión de los Condes. The latter was released and sent into exile in Toledo.
Sancho the Strong was crowned king of León.
Sancho the Strong was betrayed and murdered by a Zamoran noble during his assault on Zamora, Spain.
Alfonso the Brave succeeded his brother Sancho the Strong as king of León and Castile.
